Improvements.Improvement: Use enhanced for loop instead of traditional for loop
Improvements.Change_Diff:
- for (JavaAnnotation annotation : annotations) {
+ for (JavaAnnotation annotation : javaParameter.getAnnotations()) {
Improvements.Description: Instead of using a traditional for loop to iterate over `annotations`, we can use an enhanced for loop for more readable and shorter code.

Improvements.Improvement: Move constant string comparison to a method
Improvements.Description: Instead of repeating the same comparison for `JAX_DEFAULT_VALUE_FULLY and JAX_HEADER_PARAM_FULLY`, we can move this comparison to a private method for more clarity and reusability.
